r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $5.6M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with McElhanney Associates. The average
  contract duration was 1.16 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $418.3K. The longest
  contract was 6.94 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.2M.
lookup_name: 'MCELHANNEY ASSOCIATES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '5.6M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '154'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '39'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '25%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '67%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.13'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '5.6M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.16'
s421_mean_contract_value: '418.3K'
s425_max_duration: '6.94'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.2M'
---
